div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.h5:
Learning for all...
Learning for life!

hr.p: It is our vision To focus on quality teaching AND learning for all students by preparing them to be responsible citizens.

h3.a: Graduation Plans Announced For CHS Class of 2020

div.p: Cozad High School Graduation: Saturday, August 1, 2020 at 11:00 am. Graduation will occur on August 1, 2020, at 11:00 am. The graduation ceremony will be one of two ways: traditional or virtual.......

div.p: The High School building/office will be closed Monday, April 27th - Friday, May 1st. Power is being shut off for the week. If you need anything from the High School, please email Mr. Beckenhauer at bill.beckenhauer@cozadschools.net. If you need technology assistance, please email Mrs. Wolfe at patty.wolfe@cozadschools.net. Thank you.
A BIG shout out to these amazing Administrative Professionals. Your hard work and dedication are appreciated today and all year. Thank you for all you do for Cozad staff & students.
Opaa! is hiring for Cozad Community Schools food service. To apply, go online to opaafood.com/careers or call Neil at 913-522-9158.

Cozad High School Football and the Cozad Football Boosters are conducting our 2020 Cozad HS Football Challenge to help generate financial support for our program. Our participants spend many long hours preparing to be the best they can be and are very deserving of your support. Our student/athletes do a great job representing our community and would appreciate any amount you can give. Thank you in advance for your generous support! https://app.eteamsponsor.com/ETS/supportUs/244133911
